attributes.action: Bring back "married mans tax allowance" for pensioners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Married mans tax allowance for pensioners, male over 65 female over 60. We have betweens us contributed 94 years to N.I. & tax, plus 84 years to local rates. My wife pays no tax, she did not have a company pension. I have a company pension of only £109 per week and I am paying £500 tax a year.
